| ---------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------- |
| `showStartOfDay` | `show-start-of-day` | Display the day (MM/DD) at 00:00. Only works when Timeline interval is set to 'hour'. | `boolean \| undefined` | `false` |
